Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies. Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Kafka Developer hashtag#CDC hashtag#Design data processing, and build cdc pipelines hashtag#Contract to Hire hashtag#RemoteKafka Developer â€“ Data Streaming & CDC SpecialistRole OverviewAre you a highly skilled Kafka Developer with a passion for real-time data streaming and robust Change Data Capture (CDC)? We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies. hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Kafka Developer hashtag#CDC hashtag#Design data processing, and build cdc pipelines hashtag#Contract to Hire hashtag#RemoteKafka Developer â€“ Data Streaming & CDC SpecialistRole OverviewAre you a highly skilled Kafka Developer with a passion for real-time data streaming and robust Change Data Capture (CDC)? We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Kafka Developer hashtag#CDC hashtag#Design data processing, and build cdc pipelines hashtag#Contract to Hire hashtag#RemoteKafka Developer â€“ Data Streaming & CDC SpecialistRole OverviewAre you a highly skilled Kafka Developer with a passion for real-time data streaming and robust Change Data Capture (CDC)? We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Kafka Developer hashtag#CDC hashtag#Design data processing, and build cdc pipelines hashtag#Contract to Hire hashtag#RemoteKafka Developer â€“ Data Streaming & CDC SpecialistRole OverviewAre you a highly skilled Kafka Developer with a passion for real-time data streaming and robust Change Data Capture (CDC)? We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Kafka Developer hashtag#CDC hashtag#Design data processing, and build cdc pipelines hashtag#Contract to Hire hashtag#RemoteKafka Developer â€“ Data Streaming & CDC SpecialistRole OverviewAre you a highly skilled Kafka Developer with a passion for real-time data streaming and robust Change Data Capture (CDC)? We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

Role : Java Full Stack Developer,Location : Remote, Type: Contract .Job Summary The Java Full Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-availability, Tier 1 cloud-based applications on AWS. This role requires expertise in backend (Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda) and frontend (React.js, Redux, HTML, UI/UX) development, with a strong focus on infrastructure automation (CloudFormation, Terraform, Terragrunt), observability, monitoring, and performance optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with event-driven architecture, API testing, and CI/CD pipelines, implementing shift-left testing (BDD/TDD) methodologies.  Responsibilities* Application Developmentâ—¦ Design, develop, and maintain high-availability cloud-based applications using Java, Python, microservices, Kafka, AWS Lambda.â—¦ Implement and optimize React.js, Redux, HTML, and modern UI/UX principles for frontend development.â—¦ Build scalable, event-driven architectures with a focus on performance and observability.â—¦ Develop APIs and implement API testing strategies for microservices.* Cloud & Infrastructure Engineeringâ—¦ Automate cloud infrastructure deployment using CloudFormation, Terraform, and Terragrunt.â—¦ Optimize AWS compute, storage, and security configurations for scalability and resilience.â—¦ Implement Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) best practices and automation frameworks.* Testing & Quality Assuranceâ—¦ Develop and execute BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) and shift-left testing strategies.â—¦ Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability.â—¦ Enable developers to take ownership of testing through CI/CD pipelines.* Performance Monitoring & Observabilityâ—¦ Implement observability and monitoring tools to ensure system reliability and performance.â—¦ Utilize AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing for real-time monitoring.* DevOps & CI/CDâ—¦ Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for automated code deployment.â—¦ Work with cloud automation and configuration management tools to ensure smooth deployments.* Security & Complianceâ—¦ Implement secure coding best practices and enforce security policies in cloud environments.â—¦ Perform security reviews and apply AWS security best practices.If you have any consultants please share at santosh@dotstechnologies.com.hashtag#Java hashtag#Javafullstack hashtag#Job hashtag#Newrole hashtag#openings

hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Kafka Developer hashtag#CDC hashtag#Design data processing, and build cdc pipelines hashtag#Contract to Hire hashtag#RemoteKafka Developer â€“ Data Streaming & CDC SpecialistRole OverviewAre you a highly skilled Kafka Developer with a passion for real-time data streaming and robust Change Data Capture (CDC)? We're looking for an expert to design and implement scalable data pipelines, leveraging your deep experience with Kafka KSQL Streams-based transformations and a strong command of relational databases like Oracle, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. This role is critical for ensuring seamless, incremental data replication, even in environments with complex and non-standard schemas (e.g., tables without primary keys or unique constraints).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Kafka Developer, you will: * Design & Develop: Architect and implement real-time data processing solutions using Kafka Streams and KSQL. * Build CDC Pipelines: Create and maintain robust CDC pipelines with Kafka Connect, Debezium, or custom connectors. * Manage Data Loads: Handle initial data loads from large relational datasets via manual exports and ensure smooth transitions to incremental CDC. * * Document & Communicate: Produce clear technical designs, data flow diagrams, and operational procedures, and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.Required Skills & ExperienceTo succeed in this role, you'll need: * Kafka Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Kafka Streams, and KSQL. * CDC Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in Kafka Connect and CDC tools like Debezium and Confluent. * Database Mastery: Deep understanding of Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL internals and schema design. * Schema Adaptability: Proven experience handling non-standard table structures and resolving CDC replication challenges. * Data Export/Import: Familiarity with manual data export/import strategies and their integration into streaming pipelines. * Serialization Formats: Strong knowledge of data serialization formats (Avro, JSON, Protobuf). * Programming Skills: Proficient in Java or Scala for custom Kafka development. * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred QualificationsBonus points if you have: * Experience with schema registry, data governance, and data quality frameworks. * Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes). * Prior experience in data architecture or data platform engineering roles intrested candidates Please share Your CVs to Arun@hubshelltechnologies.com
